participant_1.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

participant_2.background:
I will share my love for hamburgers with others through my let's plays.
madonna is my all time favorite.
I spend my day reminiscing about my childhood and cherishing the close bond I have with my family.
i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
Fishing with my dad was one of the best times I had growing up.

content.text: Hey there! What's on your mind?
Hi! Not much, just hanging out and reminiscing about my childhood.
Nice! I like to do that too. What's your favorite childhood memory?
Fishing with my dad was one of my best memories growing up. I learned a lot about life and the importance of patience.
That sounds like a really great memory! I'm glad you have that.
Thanks! Me too. It's one of the things I miss most about him.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure he was a great dad.
He was. He always put me first and made me feel loved.
That's what a good dad does. I'm glad you had him.
What else did you like to do when you were younger?
I loved to play soccer and ride my bike. I also loved spending time with my friends.
That sounds like a great childhood.
It was! I'm grateful for all the good times I had.
Me too. I hope you can cherish those memories forever.
No problem! I'm always happy to listen.
